abstract: Train carrying crude oil derails in rural northwestern Illinois, starting fire and leading authorities to recommend that nearby residents leave their homes.
lead_paragraph: There were no reported injuries from the accident, but the authorities were recommending that residents evacuate a one-mile radius around the crash site.

headline.main: Train Carrying Crude Oil Derails in Illinois
headline.print_headline: Train Carrying Crude Oil Derails in Illinois

snippet: There were no reported injuries from the accident, but the authorities were recommending that residents evacuate a one-mile radius around the crash site.
